General.Name: Golden Pursuit Resources Ltd
General.Description: Golden Pursuit Resources Ltd., a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Nevada. The company primarily explores for precious metals. It holds interests in 13 territorial and 12 federal mineral claims located in Gordon Lake. The company was formerly known as Silver Pursuit Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Golden Pursuit Resources Ltd. in June 2018. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

3.Name: Mr. Kurt  Bordian C.P.A., BCom, CGA
3.Title: Controller
